00029     Alloc>
00030 inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
00031     traits> &out, const BOOST_XINT_RAWINT &n)
00032 {
00033     int base=((out.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 16
00034         : (out.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 8
00035         : 10);
00036     bool upperCase=(out.flags() & std::ios::uppercase ? true : false);
00037 
00038     int nsign = (n.is_zero() ? 0 : n.negative ? -1 : 1);
00039     if ((out.flags() & std::ios::showpos) && nsign >= 0) out << "+";
00040 
00041     // todo: this doesn't properly handle std::internal yet
00042     if (out.flags() & std::ios::showbase) {
00043         if (nsign < 0) out << "-";
00044 
00045         if (base == 16 && upperCase) out << "0X";
00046         else if (base == 16) out << "0x";
00047         else if (base == 8) out << "0";
00048 
00049         out << to_string<charT>(n.abs(), base, upperCase);
00050     } else {
00051         out << to_string<charT>(n, base, upperCase);
00052     }
00053     return out;

00056 template <typename charT, typename traits, bitsize_t Bits, bool Secure, class \
00057     Alloc>
00058 inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
00059     traits> &in, BOOST_XINT_RAWINT &n)
00060 {
00061     int hex=(in.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 1 : 0;
00062     int dec=(in.flags() & std::ios::dec) ? 1 : 0;
00063     int oct=(in.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 1 : 0;
00064     int count=hex+dec+oct;
00065 
00066     std::size_t base=autobase;
00067     if (count == 1) {
00068         if (hex) base = 16;
00069         else if (oct) base = 8;
00070         else base = 10;
00071     } else if (count > 1) base = 10;
00072     // else auto-base
00073 
00074     if (in.flags() & std::ios::skipws)
00075         while (in && isspace(in.peek())) in.ignore();
00076 
00077     std::string s;
00078     if (in.peek()=='+') {
00079         in.ignore();
00080     } else if (in.peek()=='-') {
00081         in.ignore();
00082         s.push_back('-');
00083     }
00084 
00085     if (base==autobase) {
00086         if (in.peek()=='0') {
00087             in.ignore();
00088             int c=in.peek();
00089             if (c=='x' || c=='X') {
00090                 in.ignore();
00091                 base=16;
00092             } else base=8;
00093         } else base=10;
00094     }
00095 
00096     while (in) {
00097         int c=in.peek();
00098         if ((base==8 && (c>='0' && c<='7')) ||
00099             (base==10 && (c>='0' && c<='9')) ||
00100             (base==16 && is_hex_digit(c)))
00101         {
00102             in.ignore();
00103             s.push_back(char(c));
00104         } else break;
00105     }
00106 
00107     BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00108         n.from_string(s, base);
00109     } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00110         // Catch invalid strings
00111         in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
00112     }
00113 
00114     return in;
00115 }
